2164.subject: ED
2164.descrlong:
This course addresses issues and strategies for teaching in K-6 classrooms with diverse students. Seminar sessions will address concerns and solutions to problems encountered in Stage 2 practice teaching and link theory to practice. (Offered spring semester and as interest warrants. May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online).

[(Prereq: ED 601 and ED 601A) and (Coreq: ED 603)]
